Hi,
i build a test to verify my library before deploying it. But I have to
=
run the tests with several JREs in order to be sure that the lib runs
prope=
rly with all jres our customers have.
today, I=B4m using a batch file where=
 I call the Testrunner and of
course I can check the exit code. But all thi=
s is in a batch file, not
in one test at all. So I set up a test where I si=
mply called the
normal test by  

		Process p =3D Runtime.getRuntime().exec=
(command);
		p.waitFor();
		int code =3D p.exitValue();
		assertEquals("Tes=
t failed",0,code);


where as command is the full java call including the d=
ifferent
jre/bin/java.exe.

The problem here is, that the single test calle=
d with exec() does not
return.

Any ideas how to run a test with several JR=
Es from within another test?

Thanks in advance, friedhelm
